text:
Netflix has pledged to allocate about 2% of the $5 billion it holds in cash — some $100 million — to Black community banks.

name: axios
text:
BREAKING: The Senate passed legislation by unanimous consent Tuesday night extending the Paycheck Protection Program through August 8, just hours before the federal loan program was set to expire.

https://t.co/jkz9UdEIEP

name: axios
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio cut the NYPD operating budget by $1 billion on Tuesday, as part of the city's police reform efforts driven by nationwide Black Lives Matter protests.

https://t.co/IMgsCRSfxj

name: axios
text:
Hong Kong's government released the text of a new national security law imposed by Beijing just as the law came into force today.

It defines crimes like terrorism and sedition broadly, but mandates harsh sentences for those found to have committed them.
https://t.co/1p5e32aYiu
